caption:
“Breaking Stones” | 18x12 | Collage on Panel
.
.
.
The title is a tongue in cheek reference to “breaking balls” and “breaking the glass ceiling”- this is a bit of a self portrait responding to my experiences persevering through a male dominated architecture program in the 80s, working in the field almost 20 years, a nod to patriarchal religion, and finally leaving and doing what I love (making art and teaching art).
.
.
